import Head from 'next/head' import { AppProvider, useAppHooks } from '../../context/AppContext' import Footer from '../footer/Footer' import Header from '../header/Header' import Modal from '../modal/Modal' const Layout = ({children}) => { const { useToast } = useAppHooks() const [toast, setToast] = useToast return (
We Lift UP
{children}
{toast && }
) } export default Layout
